articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swedish Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Karl-Olof Andersson, Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cote d'Ivoire 
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Alassane Ouattara, president of Cote d'Ivoire, on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the message Kim said he was pleased that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are growing stronger, sincerely wishing the president and people of Cote d'Ivoire greater successes in the social and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Lao President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Lao President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, met and had a talk with the DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to the country on August 5.
					 Referring to the friendly relations between the two countries, governments and peoples steadily growing stronger under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, he hoped that Korea would be reunified according to the proposals advanced by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed the will to develop the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea which is firmly adhering to the leadership of the party over the revolution and construction, while sharing the idea of socialism.

articles.title: Lao Prime Minister Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Lao Prime Minister Meets DPRK Government Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Thongsing Thammavong, prime minister of Laos, had a talk with the DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong which paid a courtesy call on him on August 5.
					 The prime minister expressed hope that the Korean people would register greater successes in ensuring the security of the country and building a thriving socialist nation under the outstanding and tested leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that the experience of the DPRK in defending socialism is a model for the progressive countries.

articles.title: Talks Held between FMs of DPRK and Laos
articles.content:
Talks Held between FMs of DPRK and Laos
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who is leading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Laos and Lao Vice-Prime Minister and concurrently Foreign Minister Thongloun Sisoulith were held at the building of the Lao Foreign Ministry on Aug. 5.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation, the DPRK ambassador to Laos and his embassy officials, and from the Lao side were officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged their views on the issue of developing the bilateral relations of friendship and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Thongloun Sisoulith said that the relations between the two countries were the comradely and strategic ones and the solid ones based on the commonness of the socialist idea.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Lao visit by the delegation would contribute to developing the friendly relations between the two parties, governments and peoples.
					
					 He hoped that the fraternal Korean people would register great successes in their efforts to defend the country, build socialism and improve the people's standard of living under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 That day he gave a reception for the delegation.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Hanoi
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Hanoi
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Asian countries arrived in Hanoi on August 5.

articles.title: Monuments to Revolutionary Activities of Peerless Great Men Erected at Different Units
articles.content:
Monuments to Revolutionary Activities of Peerless Great Men Erected at Different Units
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Monuments to revolutionary activities of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and a monument to their on-the-spot guidance have been erected at the Mangyongdae Aeguk Aluminum Sash Factory, the Hamhung Knitwear Factory and the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory.
					 The monument at the aluminum sash factory deals with the fact that President Kim Il Sung visited it on March 9, Juche 76 (1987) and instructed it to keep balance among production processes, increase the sash production capacity and produce aluminum frames complicated in forms and small in sizes.
					
					 The monument at the knitwear factory tells the story that he provided field guidance to it in May, 1957 during which he instructed it to positively introduce advanced technologies, improve the quality of knitwear and take good care of its employees.
					
					 The monument conveys the story that leader Kim Jong Il visited it in December, 2011 and underscored the need to turn it into a model factory with high-speed cutting-edge equipment, boost the production of quality knitwear and supply products to the people.
					
					 The monument at the hosiery factory tells the story that Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited it on December 10, 2010 and July 2, 2012 and stressed the need to scrupulously manage equipment and improve technical control, enhance the technical skills of the workers and increase the production of quality hosieries through a mass technological innovation movement.

articles.title: Scientific Development of Railway Transport Encouraged
articles.content:
Scientific Development of Railway Transport Encouraged
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been directed to scientific development of railway transport in the DPRK.
					 The Branch Academy of Railway Science under the State Academy of Sciences has achieved many successes in putting railway transport on an IT basis and improving the efficiency of the stationary rail butt-welder.
					
					 Successes have been witnessed in the scientific research into electric locomotive, thus laying a firm foundation for producing high-power locomotives.
					
					 The Railway Construction Institute has developed new additives, which are effective for cutting short the initial set and hardening of cement, and new type of prestressed ferroconcrete sleeper.
					
					 The Railway Vehicles Institute has set up an integrated production system in the electric wire factory of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex to put the administration and technical management of the factory on a higher scientific basis.
					
					 The Railway Scientific Information Institute has completed the designing of the integrated system of railway information services.

articles.title: Mineral Water Resources Conducive to Health
articles.content:
Mineral Water Resources Conducive to Health
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- There are many mineral springs in the DPRK which are good for health and medical treatment.
					 Among them are those in Chojong-ri, Unchon County and Kanggyo-ri, Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 In particular, the spring water in Chojong-ri has been well-known from the year 1580.  And it is called "Chojong", which means in English water with a fresh and spicy taste.
					
					 The mineral water, rich in ionized metal elements, is considered to be efficacious against chronic gastritis, duodenal ulcer, chronic enteritis and colitis, chronic hepatitis, pancreatitis, cystitis, hypertrophy, arthritis, etc.
					
					 It was registered as one of state natural monuments. 
					
					 The mineral water in Kanggyo-ri is also rich in minerals like calcium carbonate, sodium, potassium, etc. with 150 cubic meters of daily yield.
					
					 Measures have been taken to supply those mineral waters to people on a regular basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating New Korean Speed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating New Korean Speed
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to bring earlier the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving nation while creating the Korean speed, a new speed of leap forward in supreme leader Kim Jong Un's spirit of attack, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 His spirit of attack is the spirit of Juche based on the conviction of indigenous strength and undisputed advantages of Korean style, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is Kim Jong Un's outlook on extraordinary creation to conceive and design as the best thing meeting the DPRK's needs with indigenous efforts and technology and work out operations and put them into practice at the best level by Korean style.
					
					 The cause of building a thriving nation of Juche is making steady progress thanks to Kim Jong Un who regards indigenous efforts and Korean style as most precious.
					
					 His spirit of attack represents the spirit of hitting any goal at a lightning speed.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing while creating eye-opening events racing against time, keeping pace with the schedule of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 His spirit of attack also represents the spirit of uninterrupted revolution dashing ahead like wind without a moment's stop toward the eminence of the final victory.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of uninterrupted revolution of Kim Jong Un to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation, true to the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's speed of attack means a new Korean speed, the speed of advance of the country.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all service personnel and people to dash ahead like wind while creating a new Korean speed in the spirit of attack of Kim Jong Un, great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: KPA Ready to Punish U.S., S. Korean Warmongers: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
KPA Ready to Punish U.S., S. Korean Warmongers: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army solemnly declared internally and externally recently that should the U.S. imperialists threaten the sovereignty and the right to existence of the DPRK by use of nuclear strike means including a nuclear-powered carrier, it will fire nuclear warhead-tipped rockets at the White House, Petagon and the U.S. military bases in the Pacific Ocean and big cities in the U.S.
					 An article of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that entirely just is the stand of the KPA whereby it declared that it would bring a shower of retaliatory fire to the warmongers at home and abroad keen to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost while challenging the sincere efforts made by the DPRK for reconciliation and unity of the nation and the peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The DPRK's access to the powerful nuclear force was its own option for defending its sovereignty and peace, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has frequently staged big and small nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK after systematically introducing nuclear weapons to south Korea from long ago and has escalated the scale of those exercises, steadily posing nuclear threats to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are deliberately escalating tension while calling the projected Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises detailed part of the "tailored deterrence strategy".
					
					 The danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula every moment due to the U.S. and the puppet warmongers.
					
					 They had better think twice about at what great peril their nuclear war drills targeted against the DPRK would put their fate.
					
					 Should the warmongers at home and abroad dare ignite a war despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they will perish in the flames of the nuclear war started by themselves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Projected Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Projected Nuclear War Drills
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are describing the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills as "annual defensive ones". This is, however, nothing but a deceptive artifice to cover up the aggressive nature of the drills and weaken the vigilance of world people, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The drills mean the comprehensive and final test war aimed to make a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK and completely conquer it when a good opportunity presents itself.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the "tailored deterrence strategy", which was applied to the Key Resolve joint military drills in spring in the form of a mock warfare, is to be formally put into practice during the drills. 
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to improve the inter-Korean relations and create a peaceful environment.
					
					 However, the DPRK's sincere efforts and magnanimity have failed to meet a positive response owing to the U.S. moves. 
					
					 It is the U.S. sinister intention to nip in the bud the peaceful atmosphere on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension on the peninsula, aggressor and provocateur.
					
					 Only when the U.S. nuclear edge goes totally bust, is it possible to ensure a favorable atmosphere for preserving the peace on the peninsula and achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that the DPRK is examining all its necessary options.

articles.title: Brutalized S. Korean Army, Shame on Nation: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Brutalized S. Korean Army, Shame on Nation: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Private First Class Yun, 23, belonging to the 28th Division of the south Korean puppet army died as a result of barbarous group assault on April 7.
					 Much upset by a flurry of protest and denunciation by south Koreans from all walks of life, the puppet army authorities conducted emergency investigation into cases of assaults committed in the whole unit in April after the death of Yun. The results of the investigation proved that more than 3 900 superiors were involved in such harsh treatment of soldiers.
					
					 70 to 80 soldiers took their own lives due to beatings, violence and other barbarous acts in the army in a year. More than 45 000 soldiers became disabled or mentally deranged as a result of all sorts of murderous physical tortures last year alone. It is said that more than 7 000 soldiers are "interested" in committing suicides or shooting sprees in barracks unable to endure harsh assaults any longer.
					
					 Figures and facts prove that the case of Yun was not just an accidental murder but an inevitable crime that naturally takes place in the puppet army that has been brutalized through man-killings and assaults.
					
					 The south Korean army, a colonial mercenary army, serves its American master, not the south Koreans. It is preoccupied with violence and plunder, seized by extreme misanthropy and hostility toward the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The army is kept afloat with mutual mistrust, physical torture and club discipline as American-style "barracks culture" regarding barbarity and ferocity as "spirit of soldiers" is rampant in it.
					
					 There are more than 60 varieties of harsh physical tortures being enforced in the army allegedly to establish "military discipline" to hurl soldiers into war exercises with outsiders.
					
					 Human rights abuses have become daily occurrences in the army no more than a rabble as they shoot each other to death and commit group violence.
					
					 No one can vouch that such a shuddering crime as the case of beating Yun to death will not occur again in the south Korean army.
					
					 Such cases have occurred frequently so far but no one in the upper echelon of the puppet military has ever held responsibility for them.
					
					 For example, former puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin hushed up cases by shifting the responsibilities for endless hideous cases during the term of his office on to a few inferiors in charge of units. However, he was promoted to the chief of the security office of Chongwadae.
					
					 The photo of the body of Yun was so horrible but the puppet army prosecution did not focus the investigation on the deliberate beating. Puppet Defense Minister Han Min Gu went so impudent as to say that he realized the gravity of the case only after the truth of the shuddering case was made public by the "army human rights center".
					
					 Much embarrassed by the public criticism, the puppet group gets itself busy, making public a "talk to the people", giving an official order of banning beatings and violence and calling for taking disciplinary measures against those related and relevant officers.
					
					 But the puppet group can never shirk the blame as it is the arch criminal who brutalized the puppet army and turned it into a group of murderers.
					
					 It is the biggest shame on the nation to have such colonial mercenary army.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Fabricating Case of Attempted Rebellion
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Fabricating Case of Attempted Rebellion
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on August 4 denounced the puppet authorities for fabricating the case of the attempted rebellion.
					 The editorial referred to a series of trials being held over the case of the attempted rebellion of the Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 At the hearing on appeal, too, held in the wake of first trial, the prosecution insisted on far-fetched assertions about the faked-up case, failing to produce clear evidence proving the attempted rebellion, it said.
					
					 It disclosed the fact that a prosecutor in charge of the case is being investigated on the suspicion that he was bribed.
					
					 The criminal who should be judged is orchestrating such a tragicomedy as shamelessly discussing penalties, talking about "security", it charged.
					
					 The editorial called upon all the fair-minded forces to turn out as one for a proper judgment of the case.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Accused of Concealing Truth about Murder
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Accused of Concealing Truth about Murder
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- MBC of south Korea on August 4 accused the military authorities of having concealed the truth about the murder in the puppet army.
					 When there occurred a case of death of a private first class in the army in April last, the military announced it was a mere beating case but, in actuality, it was the murder caused by sustained beating and harsh acts, it said.
					
					 The military prosecution, however, did not focus investigation on deliberate beating at that time and even when it was disclosed that unspeakable harsh acts were committed in the course of investigation, the prosecution glossed them over, the radio charged, adding: It unwillingly admitted it as the truth about the case was opened to public this time. The minister of Defence testified at the "National Assembly" that he came to know about the gravity of the case only after the truth about the case was brought to light. 
					
					 As there is a lack of management and control over units, no one could inform the outside of daily repeated beating and harsh acts, it deplored.
					
					 In the final analysis, the military authorities helped criminals commit the murder, it said.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks Flayed
						
 Tokyo, August 5 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Monday in denunciation of the reckless remarks made by the puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, an idiot.
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said officials of the youth league and Korean youth and students in Japan express irrepressible indignation at puppet minister of Defense Han Min Gu who is behaving like a rabid dog.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that he let loose a spate of outbursts, hurting even the dignified system of the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Hokkaido Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the chief executive of south Korea should not   take confrontational maniac Han under her wing but oust him from his office as early as possible.
					
					 No matter how frequently the world may change, Koreans in Japan will dynamically turn out in the sacred national historic cause of glorifying the new century of Juche as the one of the country's reunification, true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for reunification, he added.
					
					 Ri Sang Sok, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Atachi branch of Chongryon, branded Han's reckless action as anti-reunification and treacherous provocation of the confrontational maniac against the DPRK and dangerous action aimed to invade it, backed by outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers will not be able to escape strong resistance of all Koreans and miserable fate of destruction as long as they persist in their confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Seminar on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held in Britain
articles.content:
Seminar on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held in Britain
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar on exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed by steering the Songun revolution took place in London on July 26 on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 Present at the seminar were figures of various circles and masses of Britain.
					
					 A representative of the Korean Friendship Association UK said:
					
					 August 25 which marks the 54th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership is a day of special significance for us.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 Since then, he had inspected many units of the KPA, wisely leading the army to fulfill its mission and role in defending the country and building socialism.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic Songun leadership, the revolutionary soldier spirit was created in the DPRK and there began in society a dynamic movement for learning from the fighting spirit and traits of the army.
					
					 The secretary general of the above-said association stressed that it was the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il in the Songun revolutionary leadership that he provided the powerful war deterrent.
					
					 A professor of University of London said:
					
					 Shortly ago, I was requested by the university to give a lecture on the guiding idea of the DPRK.
					
					 The biggest interest of teachers and students of the university was that how the DPRK is standing firm against the U.S., undeterred by the latter's moves to stifle the former though other countries could not hold out even a year under such situation.
					
					 If I have an opportunity to lecture on the DPRK's Songun politics before them, I will let them know all about the ideological and moral treasures and monumental structures created by the KPA in the course of upholding Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.
					
					 It is my duty to let them properly know about Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.

articles.title: British Organizations Support Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Worker-Peasant Red Guards
articles.content:
British Organizations Support Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Worker-Peasant Red Guards
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK and other progressive organizations of Britain made public a joint statement on July 30 in support of the July 29 statement issued by the spokesman for the Worker-Peasant Red Guards of the DPRK disclosing the crimes committed by Han Min Gu, south Korean puppet minister of Defense.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 Recently Han appeared on Yonphyong Island where the puppet army sustained a heavy military setback and incited confrontation atmosphere, claiming the island was the "place where someone's belligerency and brutality were clearly manifested."
					
					 He ignored the fact that the American master and south Korean puppet forces were chiefly to blame for the Yonphyong Island shelling incident as they instigated the soldiers to fire shells into the territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The spokesman for the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, dignified revolutionary militia force of the DPRK, in a statement warned Han Min Gu and the puppet warmongers that they should not forget even a moment that the sharp bayonets of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards are always ready to cut their windpipes.
					
					 We fully support the statement.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Bangladesh and Nigeria from July 23 to 30 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos dealing with the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Reply of Korea."
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung the army and people of the DPRK inflicted a heavy defeat upon the U.S., the first of its kind in history, though it boasted of being "strongest" in the world. They thus reliably protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The DPRK could shatter to smithereens the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and work miracles thanks to the President's outstanding strategies, tactics and original war methods.
					
					 The Korean people are now dynamically pushing ahead with the building of socialism while resolutely frustrating all aggression moves of the imperialists under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers at the event held in Nigeria praised Kim Il Sung as peerless illustrious commander and invincible and iron-willed commander who led the army and people of the DPRK to achieve victory in the war with his gifted military idea, superb stratagem and rare commanding art.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Rewrite Pacifist Constitution Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Rewrite Pacifist Constitution Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Tokyo democratic network grouping various organizations of Japan on Aug. 2 staged a demonstration in protest against the government's moves to rewrite the Pacifist Constitution in the area of Tokyo Metropolis, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang. 
					 Led by bulldozers, the participants marched, chanting such slogans as "No revision of constitution!" "No war!" and "Fascists, quit!" expressing their will to counter the Japanese government's moves to revive militarism aimed at reinvasion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador sueco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador sueco
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 6 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador  extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Suecia en Corea, Karl-Olof Andersson, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 54o aniversario de independencia de Cote d´Ivoire
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 54o aniversario de independencia de Cote d´Ivoire
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Cote d´Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara, con motivo del 54o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais. 
					 Complacido de la ampliacion y desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente deseo de todo corazon mayores exitos en las labores del mandatario y el pueblo de Cote d´Ivoire por el desarrollo socioeconomico del pais.

articles.title: Presidente lao se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente lao se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Choummaly Sayasone, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, recibio el dia 5 a la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Su Yong, que realiza una visita a Laos.
					 En la ocasion, el mandatario lao se refirio a las relaciones de amistad entre los partidos, gobiernos y pueblos de los dos paises que continuan consolidandose y desarrollandose bajo la profunda atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Deseo que Corea sea reunificada segun los proyectos presentados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Manifesto la voluntad de consolidar las relaciones con el Partido del Trabajo de Corea que mantiene con firmeza la direccion sobre la revolucion y la construccion compartiendo el ideal del socialismo.

articles.title: Premier laosiano se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Premier laosiano se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, Thongsing Thammavong, converso el dia 5 con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong que le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					El premier deseo que el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la preservacion de la seguridad del pais y la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista bajo la destacada y probada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien cumple los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Enfatizo que las experiencias alcanzadas por la RPDC en la defensa del socialismo sirven de ejemplo para los paises progresistas.
